value.stringValue: 6) When did you last service your car? (under vehicle info)

textTemplates.name: vBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!vContRec.Name_with_Salutation__c},
We refer to your email dated <Email Date>.
With regards to the change of particulars request, we have updated the necessary and it will take 1 working day for our system to reflect the changes.
If you did not authorise this change, please contact Customer Assistance at 64719111.
Thank you.

textTemplates.name: vBody1
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!vContRec.Name_with_Salutation__c},
We refer to your email dated <Email Date>.
With regards to the change of vehicle registration number request, we have updated the necessary and it will take 1 working day for our system to reflect the changes.
If you did not authorise this change, please contact Customer Assistance at 64719111.
Thank you.

textTemplates.name: vErrMsg
textTemplates.text: <font face="verdana" color="red">Customer Authentication is Failed! Send Email to Customer with form attachment. </font>

textTemplates.name: vErrMsg1
textTemplates.text: <font face="verdana" color="red">Vehicle Should be selected first for this option. Please select Vehicle.</font>

textTemplates.name: vSubject
textTemplates.text: Reply to change of particulars request (update completed)

textTemplates.name: vSubject1
textTemplates.text: Reply to change of vehicle registration number request (update completed)
